titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the American Fur Company Records
1831-1849 (bulk 1834-1847)
MS 15
titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:34 -0400.

did.abstract:
The papers of the American Fur Company consist of 138 volumes of letter books and business accounts, and 48 boxes of letters and business papers. The papers include original letters received from factors, foreign and domestic agents, mainly to Ramsey Crooks, president of the Company; copies of letters sent by the Company; records of furs received from the Indians, and orders for goods to be shipped to the factors in exchange for furs.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: American Fur Company records
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.
